name: SickBuildingSyndrome
0:
”Alexa, start Sick Building Syndrome”
”Alexa, open Sick Building Syndrome”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sick building syndrome
des:
Play an interactive Medical Infotainment-themed story with sound effects and prompts. Get ready for laughs and giggles as players fill in the blanks. This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. 
"The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment, or diagnosis. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number." 
Sick Building Syndrome, causes unexplained sickness, symptoms include headaches, nausea, slugishness and general inefficiency. A pilot study conducted by NASA, indicated that many indoor plants can help remove this sickness, In this Infotainment skill, brought to you by VayuVaidya, a premier medical research company and non-profit, we explore sick building syndrome in a short story based infotainment. This supplements a more informative interactive fiction version, with quanified risk analysis and comprehensive reading information.
This Infortainment Series, is supplemented with a live Green Clinic Consultation, where you can purchase live pollution removal plants with IOT built into them, plants which can remind you to take care of them and inform you of how they are actively improving your spaces, by eliminating the sick building syndrome.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
